xmlText.p: First Period_1, Vegas, Hyka 1 (Carpenter, Engelland), 2:29. 2, Vancouver, Baertschi 14 (Gagner), 11:30. 3, Vancouver, Vanek 17 (H.Sedin, D.Sedin), 13:48. 4, Vegas, Karlsson 32 (Smith, McNabb), 14:39. Penalties_Fleury, VGK, served by Tuch, (tripping), 8:12.
